policy.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:HttpBasic/>
        <L7p:Authentication>
            <L7p:IdentityProviderOid goidValue="c4e77a7656124937c74cdbf2653a47ed"/>
        </L7p:Authentication>
        <L7p:LDAPQuery>
            <L7p:AttrNames stringArrayValue="included">
                <L7p:item stringValue="departmentNumber"/>
            </L7p:AttrNames>
            <L7p:CacheSize intValue="100"/>
            <L7p:EnableCache booleanValue="false"/>
            <L7p:LdapProviderOid goidValue="c4e77a7656124937c74cdbf2653a47ed"/>
            <L7p:QueryMappings queryAttributeMappings="included">
                <L7p:item mapping="included">
                    <L7p:AttributeName stringValue="departmentNumber"/>
                    <L7p:JoinMultivalued booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:MatchingContextVariableName stringValue="clearanceLevel"/>
                </L7p:item>
            </L7p:QueryMappings>
            <L7p:SearchFilter stringValue="(cn=${request.authenticatedUser} )"/>
            <L7p:SearchFilterInjectionProtected booleanValue="true"/>
        </L7p:LDAPQuery>
        <L7p:HardcodedResponse>
            <L7p:Base64ResponseBody stringValue="JHtyZXF1ZXN0LmF1dGhlbnRpY2F0ZWRVc2VyfSAtICR7Y2xlYXJhbmNlTGV2ZWx9"/>
        </L7p:HardcodedResponse>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
